message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $10000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $11000.  This reflects the value you'll gain from the product. Let's see if we can close this deal!
